text: :wave:  At <https://www.betterment.com|Betterment>, we're hiring for our first HubSpot-focused <https://boards.greenhouse.io/betterment/jobs/3072384?gh_jid=3072384|website experience developer> — we're looking for somebody based in the U.S. who would love to engage in the build out of our custom theme and would like to see advanced use of HubSpot CMS come to life across teams. We just launched a new <https://www.betterment.com|homepage> today (on our current WP site), so that should give you an idea of the kind of fun design work we engage in!
